sections.code:
/* ---->> GENERAL PURPOSE MAIN ARTICLE <<---- */
/*
ARTICLE:lang(ko-kr) P,
ARTICLE:lang(ko) P,
DIV.entry-content:lang(ko-kr) P,
DIV.entry-content:lang(ko) P,
DIV.page-content:lang(ko-kr) P,
DIV.page-content:lang(ko) P,
DIV.area_view:lang(ko-kr) P,
DIV.area_view:lang(ko) P,
DIV.body-article:lang(ko-kr) P,
DIV.body-article:lang(ko) P,
DIV.article_content .article_view:lang(ko) P,
DIV.post-content:lang(ko) P, DIV.post-content P,
DIV.tt_article_useless_p_margin:lang(ko) P
*/
ARTICLE P,
DIV.entry-content P,
DIV.page-content P,
DIV.post-content P,
DIV.area_view P,
DIV.body-article P,
DIV.article_content .article_view P,
DIV.tt_article_useless_p_margin P,
SECTION.markdown-section P,
DIV[itemprop="articleBody"] P,
SECTION.main-content P
{
    font-family: Noto Serif, Songti TC, Chosunilbonm;
}
